attributes.action: Bring back closing time in pubs & reduce club hours.
attributes.additional_details: I think we should return to the past for britains answers to its problems,whats happened since last orders stopped & having licences to sale drink all night,leading to more drinking problems,youth drinking,services stretched.The amount of nightclubs have increased dramatically,which drinking got us out of the recession.The country is getting worse not better,overcrowded & used.The public is no longer proud of britain.The attitude towards drinking by the young is out of control & this 'we can do what we want' attitude isnt going to help the next generations lessons.Drinking was having a glass of wine not 40 cans in one night.If i had the funds i'd leave the u.k.
